net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_generateConditionFieldHtml
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Generate the HTML for the condition field of a roll expression

arg(0) = Identifier for the row
arg(1) = Field name
arg(2) = The value to be displayed in the field
arg(3) = The class that is attached to fields for type steps created by type
arg(4) = The supported state groups

The html for the condition field is sent to chat
